EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy by Pivotal’s Michael Coté. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey. Given your interest in this eBook, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Check out a preview of Coté's next eBook: Beyond "Survival Is Not Mandatory," the Cloud-Native Cookbook <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/beyond-survival-is-not-mandatory-the-cloud-native-cookbook-ep-54]]>
- Podcasts: Pivotal Conversations with Coté <[[https://soundcloud.com/pivotalconversations]]>
- Infographic: Secrets of Successful Cloud Foundry Users <[[https://content.pivotal.io/infographics/secrets-of-successful-cloud-foundry-users]]>
- Analyst Report: Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms]]>
- Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]>
- eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]>
- White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]>
- Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]>
- White Paper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]>
- Video: Said no CEO ever: Things that don't matter in the cloud <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GrBLE7Y2b6Q]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
